Posts.Content: i am in melbourne australia and my mother is in the same situation....she has had a little radiotherapy on her spine, and has been on aromasin. now on exastine and looking to change to afinitor or kadcycla...no news as this is occuring as we speak with oncologists. How did you get on from may this year?
Posts.Title: Xgeva, Pertuzumab, Faslodex, and Herceptin for breast cancer metastasis
